thread.title: The Wall Street Journal: Wells Fargo makes Michael DeVito permanent head of mortgage unit

title: The Wall Street Journal: Wells Fargo makes Michael DeVito permanent head of mortgage unit
text:
Wells Fargo & Co. said Michael DeVito will lead its mortgage division, after assuming the role on an interim basis following an executive shake-up in late 2017.
His permanent elevation to the top mortgage spot comes at a difficult time for the division and the broader mortgage market. As interest rates have climbed in recent months, lenders’ refinancing businesses are slowing, crimping profits in a crucial part of the business. Meanwhile, some analysts have expressed concern over the new tax law’s impact on some parts...
